pluggable.name: Lipsum
pluggable.author: The Habari Community
pluggable.description: Creates random sample data to test themes and plugins. Includes random posts, comments, and tags.

help.value:
Creates random sample data to test themes and plugins. By default the plugin will create 20 posts, 6 comments on each post and 10 tags per post. You can configure these values once the plugin has been enabled.

Deactivating the plugin will remove all of the entries, comments and tags created by this plugin.
